title: When Christmas Comes Around...
description: When Christmas Comes Around... is the upcoming ninth studio album by American singer Kelly Clarkson, set to be released by Atlantic Records on October 15, 2021. Produced by Jesse Shatkin, Jason Halbert, Joseph Trapanese and Aben Eubanks, it is her second Christmas album after Wrapped in Red (2013) and a follow-up to her eighth studio album Meaning of Life (2017). Featuring cover versions of Christmas songs, as well as original co-penned tracks and duets with Chris Stapleton, Ariana Grande and Brett Eldredge, its release was preceded by the album's lead single "Christmas Isn't Canceled (Just You)".
